author: brane
msg: Follow up to r887178; replace ASCII control characters with glyphs
from the Control Pictures Unicode range and refactor the escaping funcs.
(xml_encode_map): New escape mapping, extracted from xml_encode.
(replace_from_map): New function. Munge string with an escape mapping.

author: marvin
msg: Use CB_deserialize in Obj_deserialize now that it's available.

author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-2223: RecipientList now supports parallel, stopOnException and what else it can get hand on. Added option to @RecipientList to configure this as well.
